title: All Night Long
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It's a dance floor demolition
Right on the beat, beat, beat
It's a cold beer kinda tradition
So raise 'em up if you're with me

[Pre-Chorus]
The kinda thing that you can't control
Gets down in your heart and soul

[Pre-Chorus]
The kinda thing that you can't control
Gets down in your heart and soul

soundsLike: A crossover country hit kicks off with twangy acoustic guitar and crisp percussion, then layers in modern pop synths and a pulsing four-on-the-floor beat, Verses keep it rootsy with fiddle or pedal steel accents, The chorus bursts with catchy vocal hooks, stacked harmonies, and dynamic bass

### Sounds Like
A crossover country hit kicks off with twangy acoustic guitar and crisp percussion, then layers in modern pop synths and a pulsing four-on-the-floor beat, Verses keep it rootsy with fiddle or pedal steel accents, The chorus bursts with catchy vocal hooks, stacked harmonies, and dynamic bass
